import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Observable } from 'rxjs'; import { User } from '../_models/user'; import { AccountService } from '../_services/account.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-nav', templateUrl: './nav.component.html', styleUrls: ['./nav.component.css'] }) export class NavComponent implements OnInit { model : any ={} currentUser$:ob constructor(private accountService: AccountService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.currentUser$ = this.accountService.currentUser$; } login() { this.accountService.login(this.model).subscribe(response =>{ console.log(response); }, error =>{ console.log(error); }) } logout(){ this.accountService.logout(); } }
